reviews.review_msg: Prof Sessional Just might be The G.O.A.T! He is Truly Caring and Is Very patient when It comes To Teaching. He Answers every Question and Fosters Great discussion During Lectures! The entire Class Learned a Lot and we Even Had a Pizza Party at the End! I like Scratching my Gooch and Sniffing my Fingers! Take Stans Course; You won't Regret it!

But in the silence of the cafeteria, I hear a laugh and it was Stan. He understood all my references and we became fast friends.  Our shared humor effortlessly connected our worlds. We spent hours talking about everything. In a place where I felt invisible, Stan made me feel seen, and for the first time in a long while, I wasn't alone.

had to make them laugh quickly or I would blow my chance with them. I made the widest grin I could possibly make (Trying to mimick the "When the imposter is sus" meme) and I said "When the imposter is sus" I then tried to make a face that resembled the "Flushed" emoji (as part of the meme) however I don't think any of them understood the reference

They were all dead silent (honestly they just didn't know how fun of a game it was). I slapped the middle of our table (to mimick the "emergency meeting" feature in Among Us), and I screamed "EMERGENCY MEETING!!!" Again, none of them laughed. One of them looked at me and said "Can you please sit somewhere else?" At this point, I realized that I

I noticed that one of the kids (who happened to be wearing black) was sitting above a vent. I yelled "Black is sus! He's on top of a vent!!" Everyone at the table looked up at me, but no one laughed (they probably didn't get the reference). I wanted to get them familiar with it, so I asked "Do to guys wanna play some Among Us?"

So yesterday at lunch, I was about to eat with my friends from band when I realized that there was an empty seat at a table with some of the popular kids. I decided to take advantage of this opportunity to troll them, and perhaps befriend some of them. I sat at their table, and right as I sat down,

I'm not typically one to glaze, but Stan is a revelation! Stan's humor is a rare gem, polished to perfection with each lecture. His ability to craft memes that resonate, entertain, and occasionally make me snort-laugh is a gift. Stan's dedication to the art form is inspiring, and his students are the lucky recipients of his comedic brilliance.
The greatest professor of all time. Stan's course changed my life.

Love this guy. I have never taken a better class than with Stan. I will be naming my firstborn after him. There is no Stanley Cup but the Stan Sessional Cup. I sing the praises of this glorious man from the rooftops of the galaxy.
